solution_line_template: The squirrel split the {total_acorns} acorns into thirds, so it had {num_piles} piles of {total_acorns} / {num_piles} = <<{total_acorns}/{num_piles}={acorns_per_pile}>>{acorns_per_pile} acorns.
The squirrel will have {num_piles} * {taken_per_pile} = <<{num_piles}*{taken_per_pile}={acorns_for_spring}>>{acorns_for_spring} acorns to eat at the beginning of spring.
